document_data.name: The Rosebud
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rosebud''' was a [[tavern]] found in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The Rosebud was found along the [[Harbor Loop]] within sight of the [[River Thunn]] in the eastern section of the city.
document_data.Activities: This tavern was actually an outdoor [[ale]] garden. It was frequented primarily by merchants and young nobles.
